reviewText: This video was extremely informative and thought-provoking. It leads one to question and inquiry, and as we all know, this leads to knowledge. It is an important video for everyone but specifically for the black youth of today who do not understand the significance of their history and its impact on today. It is a must see!!!!
A must have for every person who truly love the truth

This DVD was great until the ending.  I strongly disagree that slavery happened to "humble the black man/race".  Slavery was an evil that should never have happened and I refuse to blame the victimized for this atrocity.  This is more falsehoods and inaccuracies about the truth of the African Holocaust.
every American home should have a copy.
Very good. Highly informative.  This information is something that should have been taught in all schools throughout America.
From a "white" mans eyes, brings back to the fact that we are from one family line, that of the creator.

A good mission but poor delivery. I was very, very, very disappointed that this DVD focused on Christianity. The DVD should have mentioned that in its cover. Once a person combines history with mythology and then presents that mythology as historical facts - then it poses a big problem. The DVD lost credibility once that was done. I would file this DVD under Christianity or Religion. If you expect pure history, you will be disappointed, with this product. I would actually like to return my copy or give it away for free. Very disappointed. I gave it two stars because the mission of the documentary, as I understood it, to reveal history from the other side of the story (from Africans themselves) was good, but the execution was very poor, mixing it with Serapis Christos. I would advice the producers to get more historical facts on Serapis before they try and impose that on other people. Peace and blessings.

The movie in question is very good. I only have 1 problem that I would like to point out. It points toward the christian faith as the model for success. Singling out a particular religion narrows the audience to only those who believe in Jesus Christ's divinity. I would like a film that focuses on historical facts and not mythology.
This is an excellent product but I can not afford this price I would recommend this for everyone's viewing enlightment
